a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate in armed conflicts, World
Deaths of combatants and civilians due to fighting, per 100,000 people. Included are interstate, intrastate,
extrasystemic, non-state conflicts, and one-sided violence that were ongoing that year.
Data source: Uppsala Conflict Data Program (2023)
